def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Contratos import CNContrato
registro = widget.ProviderWidget if registro == None: return
handleBreadCrumbContrato = widget.Breadcrumb.Parent.Entity.Handle
if handleBreadCrumbContrato == None: return
contrato = CNContrato.GetFirstOrDefault(handleBreadCrumbContrato.Value)
if contrato == None: return
permissaoApontamentos = contrato.IncluiEditaExcluiApontamentos
if widget.View.Commands["New"] != None: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = permissaoApontamentos
